dct_title_s: South Island : Te Wai Pounamu : city & regional map / Hema.
dct_description_sm: Depths shown in bathymetric tints. Road map of South Island/Te Waipounamu, New Zealand, showing roads, railways, tracks, ski fields, lakes, glaciers, tourist points of interest and national parks. Relief shown by digital shading and spot heights. Panel title. Includes distance chart and index to towns and places.
